title: Support rework/update
body:
Hello!

I play support quite a bit (leona is my fav) 

I was hoping in the near future if you could make a few adjustments to her passive and W making them more interactive  (eg getting stacks that equal a stun like braum but her next basic attack deals empowered damage) What if you made her W some sort of passive ability that increases her armor and magic resisted based off her passive?

Also would love to see something done to Zilean and nunu aswell.

replies.body:
Honestly I'd like to see Leona's passive work more like Lux's.

I've played a lot of Leona over the years, I prefer to play her in the jungle, her strength as a brawler/tank is incredible, and her ganks are incredible.
But with the changes to the jungle in recent times, off key junglers are not as viable as you'd like them to be.
